about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack from game Unlife.
It contains 15 instrumental compositions.

01 World in darkness (trailer)
02 Falling Down (intro)
03 Rain like Tears (main_menu)
04 Darkness in every corner (Darkness in every corner)
05 Memories (briefing)
06 Metal grave (in the boat)
07 New nightmares (episode two)
08 Webs of death (episode three)
09 Danger from deep (boss theme)
10 Last waters (episode four)
11 The last hope (episode five)
12 Better to cant swim (episode six)
13 Deep of nightmare (episode seven)
14 Bridges of past (episode eight )
15 Escape from dark (ending)

Wav 44 kHz, 2117 kbps

short_description: Original Soundtrack from game Unlife by Gusev Dmitriy (diedemor) It contains 15 instrumental compositions.
